chunks.zh: Apple Vision Pro 首发体验
chunks.en: Apple Vision Pro First Impressions

chunks.zh: 美东 8:00 的 pickup ，用了一个小时。
chunks.en: Pickup at 8:00 AM EST, took an hour.

chunks.zh: 已经发现几个媒体没提过的硬伤了：
chunks.en: Already discovered a few critical flaws that the media hasn't mentioned:

chunks.zh: 1. 不支持 YubiKey ，因为没有 USB 口，也没有 NFC 。
chunks.en: 1. No YubiKey support, because there's no USB port, and no NFC.

chunks.zh: 如果你想登录一个网站但你只配置了 YubiKey ，那抱歉，登录不了。
chunks.en: If you want to log into a website but you've only configured YubiKey, then sorry, you can't log in.

chunks.zh: 当然 Passkey 是支持的。
chunks.en: Of course, Passkey is supported.

chunks.zh: 如果主要 Apple ID 配置了 Yubikey 是不影响的，类似 Apple Watch ，可以通过 iPhone 配对的方式登录进去。
chunks.en: If the main Apple ID is configured with Yubikey, it's not affected, similar to Apple Watch, you can log in through iPhone pairing.

chunks.zh: 同理各种企业级的 USB 私有验证更是没戏了。
chunks.en: Similarly, various enterprise-level USB private authentications are out of the question.

chunks.zh: BTW：iPhone 、iPad 均支持 Yubikey ，其中 iPhone 是支持 NFC 的无线 YubiKey 的。
chunks.en: BTW: iPhone and iPad both support YubiKey, and iPhone supports NFC-based wireless YubiKey.

chunks.zh: 我不确定 YubiKey 的具体技术原理，不知道未来能否通过软件实现在 iPhone 上验证 Key 在 Vision Pro 上登录。
chunks.en: I'm not sure about the specific technical principles of YubiKey, I don't know if it can be implemented through software in the future to verify the Key on the iPhone and log in on Vision Pro.

chunks.zh: 2. 不支持 iOS 17.2 的 [iMessage contact key verification]( https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT213465)。
chunks.en: 2. Does not support iOS 17.2's [iMessage contact key verification]( https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT213465).

chunks.zh: 这点功能同时也影响了 Facetime 。
chunks.en: This feature also affects Facetime.

chunks.zh: 如果你 Apple ID 启用了这个功能，那 Vision Pro 会失去 iMessage/Facetime 功能。
chunks.en: If your Apple ID has this feature enabled, then Vision Pro will lose iMessage/Facetime functionality.

chunks.zh: 其实 Xcode 也说明了这点了，如果 minimum deployments 设置为 iOS 17.2 ，那么 visionOS 1.0 就部署不了，visionOS 1.0.2 = iOS 17.1.x 。
chunks.en: In fact, Xcode also explains this point, if the minimum deployments is set to iOS 17.2, then visionOS 1.0 cannot be deployed, visionOS 1.0.2 = iOS 17.1.x.

chunks.zh: 这点就可以看出 Apple 发布 Vision Pro 还是很急的，或许是苹果觉得 visionOS 1.1 的 Bug 太多了，所以苹果就没有发布，导致了现在功能不匹配。
chunks.en: This shows that Apple was in a hurry to release Vision Pro, perhaps Apple felt that visionOS 1.1 had too many bugs, so Apple did not release it, resulting in the current feature mismatch.

chunks.zh: Note：iOS 17.1 发布时间是 2023 年 10 月 25 日，iOS 17.2 发布时间是 2023 年 12 月 11 日。
chunks.en: Note: iOS 17.1 was released on October 25, 2023, and iOS 17.2 was released on December 11, 2023.

chunks.zh: 此外就是大家都知道的问题：
chunks.en: In addition, there are the problems that everyone knows:

chunks.zh: 1. 宣称每只眼睛分辨率大于 4K ，但摄像头的分辨率其实不高，看真实世界到不了 4K 水平。
chunks.en: 1. Claims that the resolution of each eye is greater than 4K, but the resolution of the camera is actually not high, and the real world cannot reach 4K level.

chunks.zh: 2. 过了一会儿摘下眼镜后，会发现自己的 5K 显示器比 Vision Pro 清晰到不知哪里去了
chunks.en: 2. After taking off the glasses after a while, you will find that your own 5K monitor is much clearer than the Vision Pro.

chunks.zh: 3. 戴久了脖子疼，因为它会让头重心靠前。
chunks.en: 3. It hurts your neck after wearing it for a long time because it makes the head's center of gravity lean forward.

chunks.zh: 看电影体验感觉也未必比 5K 显示器强（待长期测试，但舒适度和清晰度已经输了），操作还是很不习惯，键盘输入体验远差于 iPhone 这种屏幕键盘，比 Apple TV 的输入倒是稍微好一点，跟实体键盘更是没法比。
chunks.en: The movie viewing experience may not be better than a 5K monitor (to be tested for a long time, but comfort and clarity have already been lost), the operation is still very unaccustomed, the keyboard input experience is far worse than the iPhone's screen keyboard, a little better than the Apple TV's input, and cannot be compared with a physical keyboard.

chunks.zh: 打算配对个 PlayStation 手柄专门给 Vision Pro 用了。
chunks.en: I plan to pair a PlayStation controller specifically for Vision Pro.

chunks.zh: 没用过其他的 VR 设备，所以我也不清楚 Vision Pro 是否比别的 VR 更好。
chunks.en: I haven't used other VR devices, so I don't know if Vision Pro is better than other VRs.

chunks.zh: 有什么新的体验我会在这里继续 Append ，有啥需要我试的可以留言，我也许会试。
chunks.en: I will continue to append any new experiences here. If there is anything you want me to try, you can leave a message, and I might try it.

chunks.zh: @quake0day “There is a lot of very complicated display scaling going on behind the scenes here, …… Your Mac thinks it’s connected to a 5K display with a resolution of 5120 x 2880, and it runs macOS at a 2:1 logical resolution of 2560 x 1440, just like a 5K display. (You can pick other resolutions, but the device warns you that they’ll be lower quality.) That virtual display is then streamed as a 4K 3560 x 2880 video to the Vision Pro, …… you have a grand total of 2560 x 1440 to place windows in, regardless of how big you make the Mac display in space, and you’re not seeing a pixel-perfect 5K image.”https://www.theverge.com/24054862/apple-vision-pro-review-vr-ar-headset-features-price实际上可能是有 4K 的
chunks.en: @quake0day "There is a lot of very complicated display scaling going on behind the scenes here, ...... Your Mac thinks it’s connected to a 5K display with a resolution of 5120 x 2880, and it runs macOS at a 2:1 logical resolution of 2560 x 1440, just like a 5K display. (You can pick other resolutions, but the device warns you that they’ll be lower quality.) That virtual display is then streamed as a 4K 3560 x 2880 video to the Vision Pro, ...... you have a grand total of 2560 x 1440 to place windows in, regardless of how big you make the Mac display in space, and you’re not seeing a pixel-perfect 5K image.” https://www.theverge.com/24054862/apple-vision-pro-review-vr-ar-headset-features-price, actually it may have 4K.

chunks.zh: Apple 肯定是知道这些问题的，但着急发售就没解决
chunks.en: Apple definitely knows these problems, but it didn't solve them in a hurry to release it.

chunks.en: Then the benefit is that you won't get your phone dirty while eating, and it's quite convenient to operate remotely.

chunks.en: When logging into V2EX with Vision Pro, I entered the verification code several times.

chunks.zh: 此外 Vision Pro 现在完全没有输入英文以外字符的能力（无论是听写还是键盘），这就是为啥上面那些是英文
chunks.en: In addition, Vision Pro currently has no ability to input characters other than English (whether it's dictation or keyboard), which is why the above are in English.
